document.full_text: walt disney co broke ground on its long-awaited shanghai disneyland theme park on friday, banking on its global brand and fairytale attractions to draw millions of visitors and boost its profits in the region.
document.title: disney's magic kingdom comes to the middle kingdom
lines_and_colors: walt disney co broke ground on its long-awaited shanghai disneyland theme park on friday, banking on its global brand and fairytale attractions to draw millions of visitors and boost its profits in the region.
